Posted By: MVSNYC
FWIW, neither SGC nor PSA slabs blank-backed cards...T206, T205, etc...

W514 and other cards that were issued with blank backs are a different story.

Posted By: Jimi
Thanks for the info as it is much appreciated.  So, I'll change the wantlist thn.

Jimi

Posted By: Matt E.


A T205 blank back of Lee Tannehill was given an "Authentic" designation by PSA.

Posted By: J Levine
I was also told that SGC will now give an Auth. grade on T205 blank backs but that is heresy so I would contact them and ask them. 

Joshua

Posted By: MVSNYC
thanks guys, i will call PSA & SGC again...6 months ago neither would slab blank-back T206's...

i'd be happy if they slabbed mine.

happy new years guys!

We have two slabbed T205 blank backs.  One of them is a PSA and the other is either PSA or SGC (both are slabbed as Auth).
